windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some new features and many bug fixes and improvements.

New features:

  • Automatic ordered list support

Improvements and bug fixes:

  • Much smoother scrolling on Windows and Linux
  • Fixed issue with closing/expanding panes via horizontal swipe
  • You can now delete an image by pressing the delete/backspace key
  • Fixed an issue with the cursor not appearing at the right location after pressing return
  • Huge performance boost when handling very large notes
  • Fixed an issue on Windows and Linux where the window didn't show the native title bar
  • Fixed an issue when moving selected blocks up/down using keyboard shortcuts and the editor lost focus

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love to hear from our users.
